snippet: The gallery, first on Orchard Street and then on a second floor on Rivington Street, will be spreading into its building’s storefront on the Bowery.
abstract: Robin Pogrebin Inside Art Column; On Stellar Rays art gallery owner Candice Madey announces expansion of its lower Manhattan building; artist Duke Riley uses live pigeons in art performance Fly by Night, created in collaboration with Creative Time; Clark Art Institute in Williamstown, Mass, displays rarely-seen Eugene Delacroix painting, on long-term loan from Lewisohn family.
lead_paragraph: The gallery, first on Orchard Street and then on a second floor on Rivington Street, will be spreading into its building’s storefront on the Bowery.

headline.print_headline: On Stellar Rays Expands Its Lower East Side Universe
headline.main: On Stellar Rays Expands Its Lower East Side Universe
